list.sql: select rownum xh,m.* ,'评价' pjbtn,'未听' as weiting ,m.pjitemcount from ( select kcwh.zjr,g1.id kwid,g1.bt,kcwh.jxxs,kcwh.kssj,kcwh.jssj,kcwh.kc_id,(6-nvl(jst.ypitemcount,0)) as pjitemcount ,'[version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]' bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass ,(case when [ispj]<>1 and exists(select kwedate from jw_kcfb fb WHERE kwinfo_id=g1.id AND kwkcid=kcwh.kc_id and kwedate>SYSDATE-[sysconfig.PJKCJSLasyDays] and kwedate<sysdate) then 1 else 1 end) hasdispaly ,'[ispj]' ispj from jw_kcwh kcwh inner join g_infos g1 on g1.id=kcwh.info_id and g1.deleted<>-1 and kcwh.jxxs is not null and kcwh.jxxs <>'讲座' inner join jw_bcgl bc on kcwh.bcid like '%'||bc.info_id||'%' inner join g_infos g2 on g2.id=bc.info_id and g2.deleted<>-1 inner join jw_kcfb fb on fb.kwinfo_id=kcwh.info_id inner join jw_kcfbindex indx on indx.id=fb.fid left join jw_appraiseStudentTotal jst on kcwh.info_id=jst.kwid and jst.userid=[userid] where g1.objclass='KCWH' and bc.info_id='[bcid]' and fb.kwedate<SYSDATE order by fb.kwedate desc ) m

select rownum xh,m.* ,'评价' pjbtn from ( select kcwh.zjr,g1.id kwid,g1.bt,kcwh.jxxs,kcwh.kssj,kcwh.jssj,kcwh.kc_id ,'[Version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]'bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass ,(case when [ispj]<>1 and exists(select kwedate from jw_kcfb fb WHERE kwinfo_id=g1.id AND kwkcid=kcwh.kc_id and kwedate>SYSDATE-[sysconfig.PJKCJSLasyDays] and kwedate<sysdate) then 1 else 1 end) hasdispaly ,'[ispj]' ispj from jw_kcwh kcwh inner join g_infos g1 on g1.id=kcwh.info_id and g1.deleted<>-1 and kcwh.jxxs is not null and kcwh.jxxs <>'讲座' inner join jw_bcgl bc on kcwh.bcid like '%'||bc.info_id||'%' inner join g_infos g2 on g2.id=bc.info_id and g2.deleted<>-1 inner join jw_kcfb fb on fb.kwinfo_id=kcwh.info_id inner join jw_kcfbindex indx on indx.id=fb.fid where g1.objclass='KCWH' and bc.info_id='[bcid]' and exists(select * from jw_appraise ja where ja.bcid=bc.info_id and ja.kcid=kcwh.kc_id and ja.kwid=g1.id and ja.ispost in(1) and version='[Version]' and plan='[edition]' and pjtypeid='[itemid]' and pjtype='[bcorclass]' AND ja.userid=[userid]) and fb.kwedate<SYSDATE) m

select rownum xh,m.* ,'评价' pjbtn from ( select kcwh.zjr,g1.id kwid,g1.bt,kcwh.jxxs,kcwh.kssj,kcwh.jssj,kcwh.kc_id ,'[version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]'bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass ,(case when [ispj]<>1 and exists(select kwedate from jw_kcfb fb WHERE kwinfo_id=g1.id AND kwkcid=kcwh.kc_id and kwedate>SYSDATE-[sysconfig.PJKCJSLasyDays] and kwedate<sysdate) then 1 else 1 end) hasdispaly ,'[ispj]' ispj from jw_kcwh kcwh inner join g_infos g1 on g1.id=kcwh.info_id and g1.deleted<>-1 and kcwh.jxxs is not null and kcwh.jxxs <>'讲座' inner join jw_bcgl bc on kcwh.bcid like '%'||bc.info_id||'%' inner join g_infos g2 on g2.id=bc.info_id and g2.deleted<>-1 inner join jw_kcfb fb on fb.kwinfo_id=kcwh.info_id inner join jw_kcfbindex indx on indx.id=fb.fid where g1.objclass='KCWH' and bc.info_id='[bcid]' and exists(select * from jw_appraise ja where ja.bcid=bc.info_id and ja.ispost=0 and ja.kcid=kcwh.kc_id and ja.kwid=g1.id and version='[version]' and plan='[edition]' and pjtypeid='[itemid]' and pjtype='[bcorclass]' AND ja.userid=[userid]) and fb.kwedate<SYSDATE) m

select rownum xh,m.* ,'评价' pjbtn from ( select kcwh.zjr,g1.id kwid,g1.bt,kcwh.jxxs,kcwh.kssj,kcwh.jssj,kcwh.kc_id ,'[Version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]'bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass ,(0) hasdispaly ,'[ispj]' ispj from jw_kcwh kcwh inner join g_infos g1 on g1.id=kcwh.info_id and g1.deleted<>-1 and kcwh.jxxs is not null and kcwh.jxxs <>'讲座' inner join jw_bcgl bc on kcwh.bcid like '%'||bc.info_id||'%' inner join g_infos g2 on g2.id=bc.info_id and g2.deleted<>-1 inner join jw_kcfb fb on fb.kwinfo_id=kcwh.info_id inner join jw_kcfbindex indx on indx.id=fb.fid where g1.objclass='KCWH' and bc.info_id='[bcid]' and exists(select * from jw_appraise ja where ja.bcid=bc.info_id and ja.ispost=-1 and ja.kcid=kcwh.kc_id and ja.kwid=g1.id and version='[Version]' and plan='[edition]' and pjtypeid='[itemid]' and pjtype='[bcorclass]' AND ja.userid=[userid]) and fb.kwedate<SYSDATE) m

SELECT rownum xh,s.bcrs,nvl(k.yprs,0) yprs,(s.bcrs-nvl(k.yprs,0)) wprs,t.*,'评价' pjbtn FROM ( select kcwh.zjr,g1.id kwid,g1.bt,kcwh.jxxs,kcwh.kssj,kcwh.jssj,kcwh.kc_id ,'[Version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]'bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass ,('1') hasdispaly ,'[ispj]' ispj from jw_kcwh kcwh inner join g_infos g1 on g1.id=kcwh.info_id and g1.deleted<>-1 and kcwh.jxxs is not null and kcwh.jxxs <>'讲座' inner join g_infos g2 on g2.id=kcwh.bcid and g2.deleted<>-1 inner join jw_kcfb fb on fb.kwinfo_id=kcwh.info_id inner join jw_kcfbindex indx on indx.id=fb.fid where g1.objclass='KCWH' and kcwh.bcid='[bcid]' and fb.kwedate<SYSDATE )t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*)bcrs , bc.info_id bcid FROM JW_BCGL BC INNER JOIN G_INFOS G ON G.ID = BC.INFO_ID AND G.DELETED <> -1 AND BC.INFO_ID ='[bcid]' INNER JOIN SUB_FILE_RELATION SUB ON SUB.FINFO_ID = BC.INFO_ID INNER JOIN JW_XYXX XY ON XY.INFO_ID = SUB.INFO_ID INNER JOIN G_INFOS G2 ON G2.ID = XY.INFO_ID AND G2.DELETED <> -1 WHERE XXZT = 0 and xy.isgbry <> 1 GROUP BY bc.info_id ) s ON t.bcid=s.bcid LEFT JOIN ( select sum(m.yprs) yprs,m.bcid,m.kcid from ( SELECT count(distinct(ja.bcid||ja.dyid||ja.ispost||ja.userid)) yprs,ja.bcid,ja.userid,ja.dyid,ja.ispost,ja.kcid FROM jw_appraise ja WHERE ja.bcid='[bcid]' and ja.ispost=1 GROUP BY ja.bcid,ja.userid,ja.dyid,ja.ispost,ja.kcid ) m group by m.bcid,m.kcid ) k ON t.bcid=k.bcid AND k.kcid=t.kc_id

pjitem.level2title: 针对理论与实践热点难点提出问题，言之有物

pjitem.level1title: 理论分析有深度有新意，信息量大，资料可靠
能提供新思路新方法，具有一定的启发性和可操作性
课堂讨论充分，时间不少于心不少于30分钟
课件制作精良，参考资料完备
点评(请用简单的语言对各位教师授课情况进行评议)：

list.sql: select rownum xh,g.bt ,'[version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]'bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass from jw_bcgl bc inner join g_infos g on bc.info_id=g.id and g.deleted>-1 where bc.info_id=[bcid]

pjitem.level2title: 对干部能力素养提高的帮助程度

item.name: 干部教育培训综合评议表

list.sql: select rownum xh,g.bt ,'[version]' version ,'[edition]'edition ,'[isyjs]' isyjs ,'[bcid]'bcid ,'[itemid]' itemid ,'[bcorclass]' bcorclass from jw_bcgl bc inner join g_infos g on bc.info_id=g.id and g.deleted>-1 where bc.info_id=[bcid]

head.pj_display_point: 很满意(5分),满意(4分),一般(3分),不满意(2分),很不满意(1分)

pjitem.level2title: 体现中央新精神新要求；符合委托方实际情况；具有针对性，满足学习需求；课程选择和排列的合理性；教学形式选择等
教学资料印制和发放；执行教学计划有序、到位等
执行请假制度与学员出勤率情况；维持课堂纪律情况；学员对教学活动的参与性、互动性；班主任工作等
